component.description: TabView is a tabbed panel component featuring client side tabs, dynamic content loading with ajax and content transition effects.
component.attributes:
&standard_uicomponent_attributes; &widget_var_attribute;
activeIndex false java.lang.Integer 0 Index of the active tab. Default is 0.
effect false java.lang.String Name of the transition effect.
effectDuration false java.lang.String normal Duration of the transition effect. Default is normal.
dynamic false java.lang.Boolean false Specifies the toggleMode. Default is false. true
cache false java.lang.Boolean true
When tab contents are lazy loaded by ajax toggleMode, caching only retrieves the tab contents once and subsequent toggles of a cached tab does not communicate with server. If caching is turned off, tab contents are reloaded from server each time tab is clicked. Default is true.
onTabChange false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute when a tab is clicked.
onTabShow false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute when a tab is shown.
style false java.lang.String Inline style of the main container.
styleClass false java.lang.String Style class of the main container.
var false java.lang.String Name of collection iterator to use in dynamic number of tabs. true
value false java.util.List List to iterate to display dynamic number of tabs. true
orientation false java.lang.String top Orientation of the tab headers, valid values are "top" and "bottom".
onTabClose false java.lang.String Client side callback to execute before a tab is closed. Return false to prevent closing.
dir false java.lang.String ltr Defines text direction, valid values are "ltr" (default) and "rtl".
scrollable false java.lang.Boolean false When enabled, tab headers can be scrolled horizontally instead of wrapping. Default is false.
prependId false java.lang.Boolean true AccordionPanel is a naming container thus prepends its id to its children by default, a false value turns this behavior off except for dynamic tabs. true
tabindex false java.lang.String Position of the element in the tabbing order.
